name: Résop Paz Yandere True
summary: Cute horror choice game with a lot of varied gameplay, from bloody battles to platforms. Come break the fourth wall that separates us! Choices that have real impacts, charming characters, a blend of retro and realistic video games. Come meet Résop and Paz.
